General.Name: Healthureum
General.Description: Healthureum is a new revelation in the crypto sphere that combines blockchain and healthcare to bring the best of both under one roof. The Healthureum platform is designed on the Ethereum based blockchain using smart contract technology to significantly improve efficiency and interoperability of healthcare services. The Healthureum token, which is at the epicentre of the project and abbreviated as HHEM, is primed to be used as the transactional medium of choice for the new and upcoming platform.

ICO.Description:
Healthureum is a new revelation in the crypto sphere that combines blockchain and healthcare to bring the best of both under one roof. The Healthureum platform is designed on the Ethereum based blockchain using smart contract technology to significantly improve efficiency and interoperability of healthcare services. The Healthureum token, which is at the epicentre of the project and abbreviated as HHEM, is primed to be used as the transactional medium of choice for the new and upcoming platform.

Team:

  • Tomoi Sei: President.
  • Malcolm Wilkinson: CTO.
  • Danuta Kowalska: Chief Project Officer.
  • Subrata Roy Sahara: Advisor.

Healthureum will be holding its ICO on the 26th of February, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 29% of the total token supplyÂ and the tokens will be available for $3.95 each at the offering. The ICO funding target is $15,000,000, the funding cap is $120,000,000 and is expected to end on the 1st of April, 2018 or when the funding cap is reached.
